concept.title: Introduction
concept.shortdesc: Facebook is a social platform that connects people across the world.

conbody.p: Facebook is a social media platform, that allows users to create profile, post content like photos or videos, message with new people, share stories, make audio or video calls, updating status, browse news feed to see what others posting, and sell or buy products in facebook marketplace. Facebook was founded by Mark Zuckerberg who also owns other platform such as WhatsApp, Instagram, Threads, and Meta. For more information about Facebook, refer Facebook wiki.
